titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Small Collections in the James Weldon Johnson Collection
Johnson (James Weldon) Collection, Small Collections in the
titlestmt.author: by George P. Cunningham and Beinecke Staff

publicationstmt.publisher: Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library

did.unittitle: Small Collections in the James Weldon Johnson collection

repository.corpname: Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library

did.abstract: Correspondence, writings, memorabilia by and relating to Romare Bearden; Augusta Bird Courtney; Frederick Douglass; Alexandre Dumas, père and fils; Paul Laurence Dunbar; Rudolph Dunbar; Elsie Taylor DuTrieuille; Jack Flodin; Mifflin Wistar Gibbs; Angelina W. Grimké; Georgia Douglas Johnson; Le Roi Jones; Alain LeRoy Locke; Edgar Mittelholzer; Arthur Alfonso Schomburg; George Samuel Schuyler; Harriet Beecher Stowe; Booker T. Washington; and Frank Yerby.

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: James Weldon Johnson Memorial Collection of Negro Arts and Letters (Yale University)

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Documents acquired by gift and purchase from various sources. For further information, consult the appropriate curator.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The Small Collections in the James Weldon Johnson Collection are the physical property of the Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library, Yale University. Literary rights, including copyright, belong to the authors or their legal heirs and assigns. For further information, consult the appropriate curator.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Name of Item]. JWJ MSS Small Collections, Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This finding aid, created before the advent of computer-generated files, has been converted into an ASCII data file by means of scanning and Optical Character Recognition software. While attempts have been made to retain the complete information from the original document, a number of format changes have been made to present the structure of this archive in accordance with current practice. In 1997, several groups of materials previously listed under "Small Collections" were removed and cataloged separately, and are noted as such in the body of the list. In 1998, the group of Miscellaneous Correspondence formerly included in this list was removed to a separate list: JWJ MSS FILE.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Small collections of correspondence writings and other material by or pertaining to African-American writers and other cultural figures, forming part of the James Weldon Johnson Collection.
